title: Raising Arizona
creator_credit: Circle Films, Ted Pedas, Jim Pedas, Ben Barenholtz, Ethan Coen and Joel Coen
brief_description: A pacy black comedy about a quirky couple who resort to kidnapping when nature fails to give them a baby. Hi (Nicholas Cage) and Edwina (Holly Hunter) decide to kidnap one of the famous Arizona quintuplets and in doing so trigger a wild chase across the country. Co-starring John Goodman and William Forsythe.
